ability.Magma Armor: Prevents the Pokemon from being frozen and increases its Fire-type move power by 30% when its HP is below 50%.
ability.Proten: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of the move it is using.

Molten Breath.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Fury Charge.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 33% of the damage dealt.

Enrage.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed stats by 1 stage.
